metadata.title: CVE-2024-27280 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[Buffer overread vulnerability in StringIO]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby3.2 - 3.2.3-1build3
ruby3.2 - 3.2.3-1build3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby3.2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.3-1build3').
jruby package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
